data.name: My First Girlfriend is a Gal: My First Half-Assed Gal
data.short_description: Junichi is dreaming about having sex with Yukana and is in a rather pleasant mood. In his dream, he reaches out to feel Yuaka’s breasts, and unconsciously does the same thing in reality, only to find a soft sensation in front of him. Junichi, surprised, awakens to find a rather large-breasted gal
